string-array.name: environment
string-array.item: 1) Add any attacking or detected Rotters.
2) Move all Rotters using the Rotter movement rules.
3) Handle all explosions and add hits, remove Rotters if needed.
4) Add Rotter hits to any character in base-to-base contact.

string-array.name: setup
string-array.item: 1) Deploy Rotters indicated on the map.
2) Deploy any characters that canbe placed to the map before game.
